text: Hagi atireti'ma ha'ma nehaza vahera maka ke hinke'za e'za Babiloni kumara eme avazagi kagine'za, zamagrama hu'naza avu'ava zantera anazanke hu'za nona huzmante'za zamazeri haviza nehinke'za, magore hu'za zamatre'za ofreho. Na'ankure zamagra zamavufaga ra nehu'za, Ra Anumzana Israeli vahete'ma ruotage'ma hu'nea Anumzamofona ha' rente'naze.
